Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 69th/Throop
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses temp. rerouted EB via 69th, Loomis, 71st, Racine & 69th; WB via 69th, Racine, 67th, Loomis & 69th due to police activity nr 69th/Throop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near 69th/Throop.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 69th, Loomis, 71st, Racine and 69th.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 69th, Racine, 67th, Loomis and 69th.

Allow extra travel time.
